meanings.definition: A series of thoughts, images, and sensations occurring in a person's mind during sleep.
meanings.sent1: Last night, I had a strange dream about flying through the sky.
meanings.sent2: She often has pleasant dreams that make her wake up smiling.
meanings.sent3: In my dream, I was a superhero saving the world with my pet cat.
meanings.sent4: Her dream of becoming a famous singer seemed closer with each performance.
meanings.sent5: The dream felt so real, I could almost touch the stars in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A cherished aspiration, ambition, or ideal.
meanings.sent1: His dream is to travel the world and experience different cultures.
meanings.sent2: She worked hard to achieve her dream of owning her own business.
meanings.sent3: Winning the lottery was just a dream until it actually happened to him.
meanings.sent4: Their dream of living in a cozy cottage by the lake finally came true.
meanings.sent5: The dream of a peaceful and harmonious world is shared by many people.

meanings.sent1: Every night, she dreams of exploring magical lands and meeting new friends.
meanings.sent2: He dreams vividly and often wakes up feeling like he was actually there.
meanings.sent3: I dreamt of a talking unicorn last night, it was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: She dreams of success and works hard to make it a reality.
meanings.sent5: Dreaming allows our minds to wander freely and create endless possibilities.
